library(tidyverse)
sample_df <- read_csv("data/sample_data.csv")
colloq_df <- read_csv("data/colloquium_assessment.csv")
colloq_long <- colloq_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = matches("^q[0-9]+"),
    names_to = "question",
    values_to = "score"
)
colloq_long <- colloq_long %>%
  mutate(score = as.numeric(score))
student_avg <- colloq_long %>%
  filter(question %in% c("q7", "q8", "q9", "q10")) %>%
  group_by(RecipientFirstName) %>%
  summarise(
    avg_score_q7_10 = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
